extendedInfo.description: Take the perfect picture of yourself using the camera. Portrait us helps you create a photo of you and your friends in the all situations. Remember when you were in front of a beautiful building or in a party and waiting to make a picture of yourself. PortraitUs help to make you and your friends are the center of the photos. Simply click how many faces should be in the photo. Select front or back facing camera and start. Then turn the camera toward yourself. The camera will make sounds if it detects you in the picture or not. After 4 photos will you be able to select the best one, and save it or share it on facebook. Share the best photos easily to Facebook so everybody can see where you have been. * Portrait with you in the picture * Select the best out of 4 photos * Save the photo to camera roll * Share with friends on facebook
